description: These cats are all doing something. Some of them are serving their owner a drink, playing with yarn, waking up their owner, hiding under a kotatsu, or you know, all that other cat stuff. Who knows what they really get up to all day. They do always seem to be getting up to something though and most of the time it is trouble!  ~(=^･･^)_旦~ (ﾟoﾟ;) ｰ8-(^._.^)ﾉ☆( _ _).oO ~(=^‥^)ﾉ◎～ ┫o(^‥^=)~ ~(=^‥^)o┳ ε=ε=((( ^-x-^)ﾉ ε=ε=ε=ヾ(э^・ｪ・^)э 0( =^･_･^)=〇 ~(=^･ω･^)ヾ(^^ ) ヾ(=^・ｪ・^)ヾ(^^ ) ヾ(=^・・^)ヾ(^^ ) ┏━o(=´∇｀=)o━┓ 目=ﾍ(=^･ω･^) ~□Pヘ(^‥^=)~ ~(=^‥^)_｡ ~(=^･ω･^)ﾉ◎～ (*･∀･)／(=^・^=) ○)))ﾍ(^･･^=)~ (=^・ω・^)ﾉ＝＝＝Θ☆(＋＿＋) ~(=^･ω･^)y＝ ‥… *→;ﾟoﾟ) ♪♪♪ Ｕ・ｪ・Ｕ人(^･x･^=) ♪♪♪ 0( = ฅ^･_･^)= ฅ= ฅ= ฅ ฅ
